title: Peach-Thyme Lemonade Recipe
full_text:
Peach-Thyme Lemonade Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
15 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
4
to 6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
fresh
peaches
, pits discarded, flesh roughly chopped
1
cup
fresh juice
from
10 to 12
whole
lemons
3/4
cup
sugar
Pinch
salt
1
bunch
thyme
3
cups
cold
water
1
quart
ice
Peach slices
and thyme leaves for garnish
Directions
Combine peaches, lemon juice, sugar, and salt in a blender. Blend on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute. Meanwhile, place thyme in bottom of pitcher and lightly muddle with wooden spoon. Strain peach puree through a fine mesh strainer into pitcher. Discard solids. Add cold water and whisk to combine. Add ice. Serve in ice-filled glasses garnished with peach slices and thyme leaves.
Special equipment
blender
Non-Alcoholic Drinks
Lemon
Peach
Thyme
